name: PHCollectionListType
desc: Major distinctions between kinds of collection list, used by the collectionListType property and fetchCollectionLists(with:subtype:options:) method.

items.name: case momentList
items.desc: A group of asset collections of type PHAssetCollectionType.moment.

items.name: case folder
items.desc: A folder containing asset collections of type PHAssetCollectionType.album or PHAssetCollectionType.smartAlbum.

items.name: case smartFolder
items.desc: A smart folder synced to the device from .
